name: Ion Arcades
summary:
Ion Arcades

⭐ Update: online multiplayer is free now and you can play with new AI players in single-player. Enjoy!

Ion Arcades brings the excitement of flying your spaceship in your environment. If you enjoy drones or RC planes, you’ll feel right at home using your controllers to fly your ship through asteroid fields and space stations, dodging traps, and competing against other players in intense Last Man Standing online multiplayer battles.
